text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Make haste! We're off to overthrow<n>the demon lord!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
Stop right there! Umamusume,<n>schmusume! You're just a
level 1<n>brawler.

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
The name's Mercenary Machos!<n>And I ain't lettin' you
so-called<n>Umamusume walk around all high and<n>mighty.
Prepare to have your lights<n>knocked out.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El... Be careful. This man has more<n>than just brawn up his
sleeve. He's<n>hiding something in his hand.

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
Huh, so you noticed! That's right. I<n>got a secret weapon that
can give me<n>superhuman strength.

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
It's called a Growth Potion! You just<n>take a sip,
and—Wroaaa!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Wh-wh-wh-what?! Your body just<n>doubled in size!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
A Growth Potion... I see. It's a potion<n>that turns you into a
giant.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Although... Pardon me asking, but do<n>you feel all right? Your
muscles look<n>awfully swollen and stiff...

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: Ugh... Cough... hack... It's just aside effect, nuthin' someone toughlike me can't handle!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
Double the stature, double the<n>strength! Imma crush you
both like<n>little ants! Arghhhh!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Heh, perfect timin'! Lemme be the<n>first to show ya—an
Umamusume's<n>got three times the strength of a<n>human!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: You lil' brat! Imma knock you into<n>next week!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hiyaaah! Shrieking Condor Wave!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: Gahhhhhh!

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
W-was that an ult?! I've never seen<n>a move like that
before!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: That little punch? Please! That wasn't<n>even a skill!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
We Umamusume never get the<n>chance to deliver full-power
punches<n>in the real world, but if we did, you bet<n>it'd be
somethin' like that!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
At most, we do pretend punches for<n>performances, but
there's no need to<n>hold back in a video game.

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
Ohh... If you're that powerful, you<n>may truly be able to take
on the<n>demon lord and their servants.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Ma'am, may I ask you a question<n>about this demon lord
that's<n>threatening your world?

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Did their arrival really come without<n>any sign or notice?

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
Indeed. The moment the demon lord<n>arrived, all of this
world's demons<n>and monsters fell under their control.<n>
We've been forced into a corner ever<n>since.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: I'm gonna beat that tyrant to a pulp!

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
You do possess extraordinary power,<n>dear brawler, but if
the legend is true,<n>it likely won't be you who defeats the<n>
demon lord.

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
"Fantasy incarnate shall look down<n>upon this world from the
heavens.<n>With innate, thunderous power, she<n>will deliver
unto the demon lord a<n>strike of destruction and felicity alike."

text_block_list.name: Mystic Granny
text_block_list.text:
In the prophecy, the demon lord is<n>bested by a strike of
thunderous<n>power from the heavens.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
A heavenly lightning strike... I'm not<n>entirely certain, but it
could mean<n>divine retribution from an angel,<n>perhaps.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Your outfit looks pretty angelic!Maybe you'll learn some lightningskills... Even a demon lord wouldn'twanna face your retribution!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: El!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Ow, ow, ow, ow! That really hurt! And<n>don't tell me it was an
accident!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
You might have a point, though. My<n>class does appear to be
on the angelic<n>side. Let me check my skill tree for<n>high
level cleric spells.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Oh. There's one called "Angelic Bolt"<n>that summons lighting.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Perhaps that could be our secret<n>weapon. But at the
moment, my level<n>is nowhere near high enough to cast<n>it...

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, I see... Well, there's only one<n>solution to that issue.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
It's time to grind some XP! Let's see<n>what's around the
village and start<n>raising our levels!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
And so, we begin our adventure by<n>explorin' the
surroundin' area!<n>However!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El, what are you doing? You can't<n>just barge into
someone's home and<n>open their drawers.

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
El, you can't just throw that away<n>here. You're polluting
the environment.

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text:
Why are you so difficult?! Now you<n>wanna act like
heaven's oracle or<n>somethin'! Leave me alone to do<n>
what I want!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: El, wait!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Nooo! Heaven's oracle has come to<n>haunt me again!

text_block_list.name: El Condor Pasa
text_block_list.text: Huff, huff... They might've beenweak enemies, but I'm totally wipedout from all that grinding. Still, I thinkwe did it...

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Our levels are high enough to<n>take on the demon lord's
army. Which<n>means the real challenge starts now.

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text: El! Grass! It's a disaster!

text_block_list.name: Grass Wonder
text_block_list.text: Is that Machos?

text_block_list.name: Mercenary Machos
text_block_list.text:
The village... Our village is under<n>attack! The demon army's
burning<n>everything!

text_block_list.name: El and Grass
text_block_list.text: Gasp?!
